description: This file contains a helper function 'downloadFromUrl' that facilitates downloading a file from a given URL, optionally with a specified filename, by creating and triggering a hidden anchor element in the DOM.

methods.name: export function downloadFromUrl(url: string, filename?: string): void { downloadFromUrl
methods.description: Initiates a browser download for the given URL, optionally specifying a filename. Facilitates file download handling in the frontend.
